specials.name: Chef's Tasting Menu
specials.fullDescription: Experience our chef's creativity with a carefully curated 7-course menu that changes weekly based on the freshest seasonal ingredients. Each dish is paired with sommelier-selected wines.

specials.name: Surf & Turf Extravaganza
specials.shortDescription: Wagyu beef paired with fresh lobster tail
specials.fullDescription: The ultimate indulgence combining 8oz Japanese wagyu ribeye with a whole butter-poached lobster tail, served with truffle fries and seasonal vegetables.

specials.name: Mediterranean Sunset Platter
specials.fullDescription: A generous platter featuring grilled octopus, garlic prawns, mussels marinara, calamari, and two whole grilled fish, served with lemon herb rice.

specials.name: Sunday Brunch Buffet
specials.fullDescription: Indulge in our lavish buffet featuring fresh pastries, made-to-order omelets, carving stations, seafood bar, salads, and decadent desserts. Includes unlimited mimosas and fresh juices.

specials.name: Romantic Dinner for Two
specials.fullDescription: Perfect for special occasions. Includes appetizer platter, choice of two main courses, shared dessert, and a complimentary bottle of champagne. Candlelit table with rose petals.

specials.name: Vegan Garden Feast
specials.fullDescription: A celebration of vegetables and plant-based cuisine. Each course showcases the versatility and flavor of seasonal produce, crafted into elegant fine dining dishes.
